author: Charles White
title: Thug douses homeless man in petrol before setting him on fire
text:
The bucket of flammable liquid (Picture: Corriere Della Sera) Horrific video has emerged of a man pouring a bucket of flammable liquid over a homeless man then lighting him on fire.
Police say a man has now confessed to the brutal attack, which left the homeless man dead.
Heartbroken baby monkey weeps as it clings to dead mother's body Marcello Cimino, 45, was set alight in the southern Italian city of Palermo.
He was sleeping on a make-shift mattress outside the local soup kitchen, a Capuchin monastery, Mission San Francesco.
Police say that petrol-station attendant Giuseppe Pecoraro has admitted he committed the crime, claiming the homeless man had an affair with his estranged wife.

The victim was doused in petrol and set alight ‘We collected a series of irrefutable evidence shows the responsibility of stopped,’ police chief Rodolfo Ruperti told La Republicca . 
‘ For the investigations we have made use of the images of the Capuchin monastery and a series of findings by studying the previous days to the brutal murder’.
The alleged killer apparently accused the homeless man of having an affair with his estranged wife.
Giuseppe Pecoraro has allegedly confessed to the crime (Picture: Polizia di Stato) CCTV images show the man lighting the mattress, covered in petrol, and getting burned hands himself.
While emergency services were called Cimino was already dead by the time they arrived.
